title: Decoursey Simon
text:
Decoursey Simon is an international <a href="association%20football">football</a> player from <a href="Saint%20Lucia">Saint Lucia</a>, who plays as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>.
Career.
He made his international debut for <a href="Saint%20Lucia%20national%20football%20team">Saint Lucia</a> in 2011.
